mapper.select: select * from t_escheduler_user where user_name=#{userName} and user_password = #{password}

select u.id,u.user_name,u.user_password,u.user_type,u.email,u.phone,u.tenant_id,u.create_time, u.update_time,t.tenant_name, case when u.queue <> '' then u.queue else q.queue_name end as queue, q.queue_name from t_escheduler_user u left join t_escheduler_tenant t on u.tenant_id=t.id left join t_escheduler_queue q on t.queue_id = q.id where 1=1
and u.user_name like concat ('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by u.update_time desc

select u.*, t.tenant_name, case when u.queue <> '' then u.queue else q.queue_name end as queue_name from t_escheduler_user u,t_escheduler_tenant t,t_escheduler_queue q WHERE u.tenant_id = t.id and t.queue_id = q.id and u.id = #{userId}
select u.* from t_escheduler_user u ,t_escheduler_access_token t where u.id = t.user_id and token=#{token} and t.expire_time > NOW()
